name: EventOn Connect
author: MoMo Themes

sections.description:
This plugin connects with Eventbrite and allows users to show events on WordPress site and also create Eventbrite events
from WordPress site itself.

Documentation: Read documentation

Display Eventbrite Events

Events will be pulled from Eventbrite and a custom widget display them as list. This automated and only needs adding eventbrite API and enabling it in the settings panel.

Export Events to Eventbrite

For EventON users, it allows exporting posts as events to Evenbrite automatically.

External URLs

Our plugin makes use of several external URLs to fetch data and enhance functionality:

  • API Endpoint: https://www.eventbriteapi.com/v3/

    • Used to retrieve data from Eventbrite.

  • Font : https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato:100,300,400,700,900,400italic

  • Example : https://www.eventbrite.com/e/mokchya-live-concert-tickets-

  • Generating API Keys : https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/api-keys

  • Image Server : https://img.evbuc.com
    https://cdn.evbuc.com

  • Terms of Service : https://www.eventbrite.com/help/en-us/articles/251210/eventbrite-terms-of-service/

PRO Version Features

  • Import multiple events from Eventbrite and automatically covert them into EventON events. PRO
  • Automatically display imported Eventbrite events on EventOn calendar. PRO
  • Import events by Eventbrite organizer. PRO
  • Import events by Eventbrite venue. PRO
  • Assign default categories to Imported events from Eventbrite PRO
  • Import event series as repeat events on EventON. PRO
  • Export recurring events to eventbrite PRO
  • Inbuilt mechanism to search Eventbrite Organizer ID easily. PRO
sections.installation:
This plugin can be installed directly from your site.

  1. Log in and navigate to Plugins & Add New.
  2. Type “exim” into the Search input and click the “Search” button.
  3. Locate the “exim” in the list of search results and click “Install Now”.
  4. Click the “Activate Plugin” link at the bottom of the install screen.

It can also be installed manually.

  1. Download the “mmt-eventon-exim-lite.zip” plugin from WordPress.org.
  2. Unzip the package and move to your plugins directory.
  3. Log into WordPress and navigate to the “Plugins” screen.
  4. Locate “exim” in the list and click the “Activate” link.
